snippet: Mr. Byrne’s video installation is a meditation on consumerism, urban decay, the energy crisis and the automobile industry.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews Gerard Byne video installation Why Its Time for Imperial, Again at Itinerant Protocinema.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Byrne’s video installation is a meditation on consumerism, urban decay, the energy crisis and the automobile industry.

headline.main: Gerard Byrne: ‘Why It’s Time for Imperial, Again’
